answers.answer: How long after ? My levels are suppose to be 120 or lower 2hrs after or 65-95 when I wake up (fasting) I have gestational diabetes also
My Dr told me 2 hrs after is the most reliable level to go by if u right away it won't be the proper reading
U should be OK if it's been an hr maybe check again in another hr to see if it's still in that range
but the dietician tld me to do it one hour after eating
Oh I'm not sure then I see a specialist for mine .. before I started seeing him I went by what my OB said and he said after 1 hr it's suppose to be below 145 so still that is a good number
Then go bcc what your dietician told you not what random.people say. 87 is normal rage regardless of gestational diabetes. I don't see a problem with it.

I was told 2 hours after eating by my endocrinologist. That's the most accurate reading. When you are pregnant it takes a little longer for you to digest food, so that's why they want you to wait at least 2 hours before testing

I'm sorry I was just trying to help since I have it .. and telling u what numbers my endocrinologist told me to go by.. I never said 87 wasn't a good number I said it's good..  but when ur preg and u test to early u may not get proper reading .. but if u go to a dietician  they should have gave a a paper saying what range they think ur blood sugar should be in so u don't have to get help from "random" ppl

question: to get an 87 for your sugar level testing after dinner? i have gestacional diabetes
title: is it normal
